title: Prohibits accountants from providing accounting services to certain corporations for 5 years after such accountant performs an audit on such corporation
summary: Prohibits accountants from providing accounting services to any corporation, the shares and bonds of which are publicly traded, for 5 years after such accountant performs an audit on such corporation; authorizes the board of regents to promulgate any rules and regulations necessary for the implementation.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting accountants from providing financial or accounting services to certain corporations audited by such accountant
